name: Check if a new booking can be created on the restful booker api

testSteps.description: When I send a POST request to booking endpoint with the information firstname "Abbie" lastname "Crook" totalprice "999" depositpaid "Yes" booking dates additionalneeds "Dinner"

children.description: Creating booking with firstname: Abbie, lastname: Crook, totalprice: 999, depositpaid: false, bookingdates: {checkin=2022-12-01, checkout=2022-12-15}, additionalneeds: Dinner
